teamcode

Class Vision

  • java.lang.Object
    • teamcode.Vision

  • public class Vision
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements Vuforia/TensorFlow Vision for the game season. It creates and initializes all the vision target info as well as providing info for the robot, camera and the field. It also provides methods to get the location of the robot and detected targets.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Vision

        public Vision(Robot robot,
              boolean useVuforia,
              boolean useTensorFlow)
        Constructor: Create an instance of the object. Vision is required by both Vuforia and TensorFlow and must be instantiated if either is used. However, to use either Vuforia or TensorFlow, one must explicitly initialize them by calling the initVuforia or initTensorFlow methods respectively.
        Parameters:
        robot - specifies the robot object.
        useVuforia - specifies true to use Vuforia Vision, false otherwise.
        useTensorFlow - specifies true to use TensorFlow Vision, false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • setupBlinkin

        public void setupBlinkin()
        This method sets up the Blinkin with a priority pattern list and a pattern name map.

      • setVuforiaEnabled

        public void setVuforiaEnabled(boolean enabled)
        This method enables/disables Vuforia Vision.
        Parameters:
        enabled - specifies true to enable Vuforia Vision, false to disable.

      • getLastSeenVuforiaImageName

        public java.lang.String getLastSeenVuforiaImageName()
        This method returns the name of the image last seen.
        Returns:
        last seen image name.

      • getRobotPose

        public TrcPose2D getRobotPose(java.lang.String targetName,
                              boolean exclude)
        This method returns the robot field position.
        Parameters:
        targetName - specifies the detected target name.
        exclude - specifies true to exclude the specified target.
        Returns:
        robot field position.

      • setTensorFlowEnabled

        public void setTensorFlowEnabled(boolean enabled)
        This method enables/disables TensorFlow.
        Parameters:
        enabled - specifies true to enable TensorFlow, false to disable.

      • tensorFlowShutdown

        public void tensorFlowShutdown()
        This method shuts down TensorFlow.

      • getBestDetectedTargetInfo

        public FtcTensorFlow.TargetInfo getBestDetectedTargetInfo(java.lang.String label)
        This method returns the best detected targets from TensorFlow vision.
        Parameters:
        label - specifies the label of the targets to detect for, can be null for detecting any target.
        Returns:
        the best detected target info.
